titleStmt.title: A warning-peece for England being a discovery of a Jesuiticall design to dismember Wales from England, to the ruine of both : together with undeniable reasons and arguments, proving the indispensable necessity of appeals from Wales to the courts at Westminister ... : humbly tendred to the consideration of His Highness the Lord Protector and his council / by a well-wisher to the peace and tranquility of this nation, P.P.
titleStmt.author: P. P., Well-wisher to the peace and tranquility of this nation.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for N. Ekins, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
